attribute.targetType: TARGET_TYPE_PROC_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_COMPUTE_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_HUB_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_CORE, TARGET_TYPE_EX, TARGET_TYPE_EQ, TARGET_TYPE_MCS, TARGET_TYPE_MCA, TARGET_TYPE_MCBIST, TARGET_TYPE_MI, TARGET_TYPE_DMI, TARGET_TYPE_MC, TARGET_TYPE_OMI, TARGET_TYPE_OMIC, TARGET_TYPE_MCC, TARGET_TYPE_XBUS, TARGET_TYPE_OBUS, TARGET_TYPE_OBUS_BRICK, TARGET_TYPE_SBE, TARGET_TYPE_PPE, TARGET_TYPE_PERV, TARGET_TYPE_PEC, TARGET_TYPE_PHB, TARGET_TYPE_CAPP, TARGET_TYPE_OCMB_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_MEMBUF_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_MBA, TARGET_TYPE_DIMM, TARGET_TYPE_L4,TARGET_TYPE_MC, TARGET_TYPE_MEM_PORT, TARGET_TYPE_PMIC, TARGET_TYPE_NMMU, TARGET_TYPE_PAU, TARGET_TYPE_IOHS, TARGET_TYPE_PAUC, TARGET_TYPE_GENERICI2CRESPONDER, TARGET_TYPE_IOLINK, TARGET_TYPE_MDS_CTLR, TARGET_TYPE_TBUSC, TARGET_TYPE_TBUSL, TARGET_TYPE_L3CACHE, TARGET_TYPE_INT, TARGET_TYPE_NX, TARGET_TYPE_PAX, TARGET_TYPE_PAXO, TARGET_TYPE_SMPLINK, TARGET_TYPE_PEC6P, TARGET_TYPE_PEC2P, TARGET_TYPE_PHB248X, TARGET_TYPE_PHB16X, TARGET_TYPE_POWER_IC, TARGET_TYPE_TEMP_SENSOR
attribute.description: 1 if the target is functional, else 0. Set by the platform.

attribute.targetType: TARGET_TYPE_PROC_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_MEMBUF_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_DIMM, TARGET_TYPE_OCMB_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_PMIC, TARGET_TYPE_GENERICI2CRESPONDER, TARGET_TYPE_MDS_CTLR, TARGET_TYPE_COMPUTE_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_HUB_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_POWER_IC, TARGET_TYPE_TEMP_SENSOR
attribute.description: Physical position of chip/dimm within socket/slot This data is from the MRW.

attribute.targetType: TARGET_TYPE_PROC_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_MEMBUF_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_DIMM, TARGET_TYPE_OCMB_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_COMPUTE_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_HUB_CHIP, TARGET_TYPE_CORE, TARGET_TYPE_EX, TARGET_TYPE_EQ, TARGET_TYPE_MCS, TARGET_TYPE_MCA, TARGET_TYPE_MCBIST, TARGET_TYPE_MI, TARGET_TYPE_DMI, TARGET_TYPE_MC, TARGET_TYPE_OMI, TARGET_TYPE_OMIC, TARGET_TYPE_MCC, TARGET_TYPE_XBUS, TARGET_TYPE_OBUS, TARGET_TYPE_OBUS_BRICK, TARGET_TYPE_SBE, TARGET_TYPE_PPE, TARGET_TYPE_PERV, TARGET_TYPE_PEC, TARGET_TYPE_PHB, TARGET_TYPE_CAPP, TARGET_TYPE_MBA, TARGET_TYPE_ABUS, TARGET_TYPE_L4, TARGET_TYPE_MC, TARGET_TYPE_MEM_PORT, TARGET_TYPE_PMIC, TARGET_TYPE_NMMU, TARGET_TYPE_PAU, TARGET_TYPE_IOHS, TARGET_TYPE_FC, TARGET_TYPE_PAUC, TARGET_TYPE_GENERICI2CRESPONDER, TARGET_TYPE_IOLINK, TARGET_TYPE_MDS_CTLR, TARGET_TYPE_TBUSC, TARGET_TYPE_TBUSL, TARGET_TYPE_L3CACHE, TARGET_TYPE_INT, TARGET_TYPE_NX, TARGET_TYPE_PAX, TARGET_TYPE_PAXO, TARGET_TYPE_SMPLINK, TARGET_TYPE_PEC6P, TARGET_TYPE_PEC2P, TARGET_TYPE_PHB248X, TARGET_TYPE_PHB16X, TARGET_TYPE_POWER_IC, TARGET_TYPE_TEMP_SENSOR
attribute.description: Logical position of target within a system. This is derived from the SMP location of each processor and each target's relationship to a proc or hub. - PROC = based on SMP groupid+chipid - MEMBUF = PROC:FAPI_POS * [max membuf per proc] - 1st level child unit = [parent chip]:FAPI_POS * [max children of this type per chip] - 2nd+ level child unit = [immediate parent unit]:FAPI_POS * [max units below parent] Note: This should not be used algorithmically by HWPs directly. Note: Value ignores physical drawer boundaries, the value is unique across the entire system. This data is derived from the MRW.

attribute.targetType: TARGET_TYPE_CORE, TARGET_TYPE_EX, TARGET_TYPE_EQ, TARGET_TYPE_MCS, TARGET_TYPE_MCA, TARGET_TYPE_MCBIST, TARGET_TYPE_MI, TARGET_TYPE_DMI, TARGET_TYPE_MC, TARGET_TYPE_OMI, TARGET_TYPE_OMIC, TARGET_TYPE_MCC, TARGET_TYPE_XBUS, TARGET_TYPE_OBUS, TARGET_TYPE_OBUS_BRICK, TARGET_TYPE_SBE, TARGET_TYPE_PPE, TARGET_TYPE_PERV, TARGET_TYPE_PEC, TARGET_TYPE_PHB, TARGET_TYPE_CAPP, TARGET_TYPE_MBA, TARGET_TYPE_ABUS, TARGET_TYPE_L4, TARGET_TYPE_MEM_PORT, TARGET_TYPE_DIMM, TARGET_TYPE_PMIC, TARGET_TYPE_NMMU, TARGET_TYPE_PAU, TARGET_TYPE_IOHS, TARGET_TYPE_PAUC, TARGET_TYPE_GENERICI2CRESPONDER, TARGET_TYPE_IOLINK, TARGET_TYPE_MDS_CTLR, TARGET_TYPE_TBUSC, TARGET_TYPE_TBUSL, TARGET_TYPE_L3CACHE, TARGET_TYPE_INT, TARGET_TYPE_NX, TARGET_TYPE_PAX, TARGET_TYPE_PAXO, TARGET_TYPE_SMPLINK, TARGET_TYPE_PEC6P, TARGET_TYPE_PEC2P, TARGET_TYPE_PHB248X, TARGET_TYPE_PHB16X, TARGET_TYPE_POWER_IC, TARGET_TYPE_TEMP_SENSOR
attribute.description:
A target's position relative to its immediate parent target.
COMPUTE - EQ - CORE/L3CACHE COMPUTE/HUB - PERV COMPUTE - TBUSL HUB - TBUSL (TBUSC - TBUSL is not supported) HUB - PAU HUB - INT HUB - NX HUB - MC - MI - MCC - OMI (OMIC - OMI is not supported) OCMB - PMIC OCMB - GENERICI2CRESPONDER OCMB - MEM_PORT - DIMM OCMB - MDS_CTLR OCMB - POWER_IC OCMB - TEMP_SENSOR OCMB - PERV
Chip position relative to the "parent" chip of the bus.
